fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Mask: Choose a role to disguise as within the first phase of the game. You will appear to win with others according to the role you chose.
- Tough Skin: You are immune to Chaos factionâ€™s Night phase attack.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Frozen Statue: Play an Attack! on a player. If they die this phase without blocking this Attack!, they will become a frozen statue. They will appear to still be alive for the next day phase and may be targeted by cards and abilities still, but cannot talk in the day chat. They are officially 'killed' the following phase. [3 uses, 1 CD]
- Snowman: Create a snowman with 1 max HP and 2 max Hand Space. You control this snowman, and it plays like a normal player. However, it cannot be targeted nor does it show up on the playerlist (though can take damage). You may only have 1 Snowman at a time. Gains a use for every player you kill. [1 use, Charging]
- Snow Golem: Create a Snow Golem with 3 max HP and 5 max Hand Space. You control this golem, and it plays like a normal player. It also appears on the playerlist and may be targeted. Gain a use for every two players you kill. [0 uses, Charging]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last player remaining, excluding Mountebank and Outsider King.
